title: Prime Track
paragraphs: Say no more to the shipment delays with our guaranteed next/two-day delivery across India for urgent shipments. Prime Track is our premium service designed for time-sensitive deliveries that cannot afford delays. With extensive network coverage and priority handling, we ensure your urgent consignments reach their destination on time, every time.

sections.title: Overview of Prime Track Service
sections.content: Prime Track is specifically designed for businesses that require guaranteed delivery within strict timelines. Whether it's critical documents, medical supplies, or urgent business shipments, our Prime Track service provides the reliability and speed you need. With real-time tracking and dedicated support, you stay informed throughout the delivery process.

sections.title: Service Key Features
sections.content: Our Prime Track service offers guaranteed next-day or two-day delivery across all major cities in India. With priority pickup, dedicated handling, and express routing through our fastest channels, your shipments get preferential treatment at every stage. Advanced tracking systems allow you to monitor your consignment in real-time, while our dedicated customer support team is available 24/7 to assist you.

FrequentlyQuestion.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FrequentlyQuestion.content: Prime Track is our fastest domestic delivery service, ideal for urgent shipments that require guaranteed delivery within 1-2 days. It's perfect for time-critical business documents, emergency supplies, and high-priority parcels.

features.title: Guaranteed Next/Two-Day Delivery
features.description: Assured delivery within 24-48 hours across India with service level agreements and on-time performance tracking.

features.title: Priority Handling & Routing
features.description: Your shipments receive preferential treatment with dedicated pickup slots and express routing through our fastest channels.

features.title: Real-Time Tracking
features.description: Advanced GPS-enabled tracking system allows you to monitor your shipment's location and status at every stage of transit.

features.title: 24/7 Dedicated Support
features.description: Round-the-clock customer support team available to assist with urgent queries and provide shipment updates.

title: Express Standard
paragraphs: Fulfil all your immediate logistics needs with our express deliveries via air, rail, and road freight at economical rates. Express Standard offers the perfect balance between speed and cost-effectiveness, making it ideal for businesses looking for reliable and timely deliveries without premium pricing.

sections.title: Overview of Express Standard Service
sections.content: Express Standard is our versatile delivery solution that combines multiple transportation modes to provide fast and economical shipping across India. By leveraging air, rail, and road networks, we optimize routes to deliver your consignments quickly while keeping costs under control. This service is perfect for regular business shipments that need reliable delivery within a reasonable timeframe.

sections.title: Service Key Features
sections.content: Our Express Standard service utilizes a multimodal approach to ensure efficient delivery across all pin codes in India. With flexible pickup schedules, competitive pricing, and a robust delivery network, we make express shipping accessible to businesses of all sizes. Our streamlined processes and experienced team ensure your shipments are handled professionally from pickup to final delivery.

FrequentlyQuestion.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FrequentlyQuestion.content: Express Standard is designed for businesses that need reliable express delivery at economical rates. It typically delivers within 2-4 days depending on the destination and uses a combination of air, rail, and road transport for optimal efficiency.

features.title: Multimodal Transportation
features.description: Flexible use of air, rail, and road freight to optimize delivery speed and cost based on your specific requirements.

features.title: Economical Pricing
features.description: Competitive rates that make express delivery affordable for regular shipments without compromising on service quality.

features.title: Wide Network Coverage
features.description: Extensive delivery network covering urban centers and remote locations across India with reliable service standards.

features.title: Flexible Pickup Schedules
features.description: Convenient pickup timings that accommodate your business operations with regular scheduled pickups available.

title: Road Express Cargo
paragraphs: Get affordable delivery solutions to ship heavy B2B consignments with special material handling and professional pickup services. Road Express Cargo is specifically designed for bulk shipments and heavy cargo that require specialized handling, making it the ideal choice for manufacturing, wholesale, and industrial businesses.

sections.title: Overview of Road Express Cargo Service
sections.content: Road Express Cargo specializes in handling heavy and bulk B2B shipments with professional care and expertise. Our service is equipped to manage large consignments, industrial equipment, machinery, and wholesale goods that require special handling. With dedicated vehicles, trained personnel, and secure transportation methods, we ensure your valuable cargo reaches its destination safely.

sections.title: Service Key Features
sections.content: Our Road Express Cargo service offers specialized equipment for loading and unloading heavy items, trained handlers who understand industrial cargo requirements, and flexible vehicle options ranging from small trucks to large trailers. We provide door-to-door service with professional pickup teams and secure packaging solutions to protect your goods during transit.

FrequentlyQuestion.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FrequentlyQuestion.content: Road Express Cargo is ideal for heavy B2B shipments weighing over 50 kg. We specialize in industrial goods, machinery, wholesale consignments, and bulk orders that require special handling and professional loading/unloading services.

features.title: Heavy Cargo Handling
features.description: Specialized equipment and trained personnel for safe loading, transit, and unloading of heavy and oversized items.

features.title: Professional Pickup Service
features.description: Dedicated pickup teams with appropriate vehicles and handling equipment for efficient collection of bulk consignments.

features.title: Special Material Handling
features.description: Expert handling of fragile, hazardous, or sensitive cargo with appropriate packaging and transportation protocols.

features.title: Affordable B2B Rates
features.description: Competitive pricing structures designed for regular business shipments with volume discounts and flexible payment terms.

title: Cash on Delivery/DOD
paragraphs: We bring you the ease of getting swift COD payments from the consignee/receiver to ensure uninterrupted cash flow. Exclusively applicable to corporate/credit customers, this service can be clubbed with our ToPay offering. Our COD/DOD service streamlines your payment collection process, reducing the hassle of follow-ups and enabling faster business cycles.

sections.title: Overview of COD/DOD Service
sections.content: Our Cash on Delivery and Delivery on Demand service is designed to simplify payment collection for businesses. We collect payments from your customers at the time of delivery and remit them to you through secure channels, eliminating the need for manual collection and reducing payment delays. This service is particularly valuable for e-commerce businesses, distributors, and companies dealing with trade customers.

sections.title: Service Key Features
sections.content: With our COD/DOD service, payments are collected at delivery and remitted to your account within a specified timeframe. The service includes comprehensive documentation, secure payment handling, and detailed reporting for easy reconciliation. You can combine it with our ToPay service for flexible freight payment options, making it easier to manage your logistics and cash flow simultaneously.

FrequentlyQuestion.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FrequentlyQuestion.content: COD/DOD service is available exclusively for corporate and credit customers. It allows you to collect payments from consignees at delivery, ensuring faster cash flow. The collected amounts are remitted to your account through secure banking channels with full documentation and reconciliation support.

features.title: Swift Payment Collection
features.description: Efficient collection of payments from consignees at the time of delivery with proper documentation and receipts.

features.title: Secure Remittance
features.description: Safe and timely transfer of collected payments to your account through verified banking channels with full transparency.

features.title: ToPay Integration
features.description: Seamlessly combine COD with ToPay service where freight charges are collected from the receiver, offering flexible payment options.

features.title: Detailed Reporting
features.description: Comprehensive reports and documentation for easy reconciliation, accounting, and tracking of all COD transactions.
